sentences.english: Polio eradication is one of our most important areas of unfinished business.
sentences.chinese: 根除脊髓灰质炎是我们未完成工作的最重要领域之一。

sentences.english: V. , or bivalent oral polio vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 双价口服脊髓灰质炎疫苗。

sentences.english: The new formulation is known as B. O. P. V. , or bivalent oral polio vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 新的形式是众所周知的双价口服脊髓灰质炎疫苗。

sentences.english: One ambitious goal of the foundation is to wipe polio off the face of the earth.
sentences.chinese: 基金会的另一宏伟目标是让脊髓灰质炎在地球上消失。

sentences.english: As a result more than 3.5 million polio cases were prevented.
sentences.chinese: 由此防止了超过350万起脊髓灰质炎病例的发生。

sentences.english: The spread of polio could end this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年有可能终止脊髓灰质炎的传播。

sentences.english: Polio eradication is feasible, and it is feasible in the near term.
sentences.chinese: 消灭脊髓灰质炎是可行的，并且在短期内就可行。

sentences.english: Its main task is to monitor the polio-free status of the region.
sentences.chinese: 其主要任务是监测该区域的无脊髓灰质炎状况。
2型脊髓灰质炎病毒已被消灭。

sentences.english: Kenya has been polio-free for the last 22 years.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼亚在过去22年里一直无脊髓灰质炎。

sentences.english: The findings of the investigation suggest a recent introduction of wild poliovirus.
sentences.chinese: 调查结果表明野生脊髓灰质炎病毒的最近传入。

sentences.english: No vaccine is currently available for the non-polio enteroviruses.
sentences.chinese: 目前尚没有疫苗能够针对非脊髓灰质炎病毒。

sentences.english: This represents the last uncontrolled reservoir of polio in the world.
sentences.chinese: 这形成全世界最后无法控制的脊髓灰质炎的蓄积地。

sentences.english: Polio once crippled 350 000 children a year globally.
sentences.chinese: 脊髓灰质炎曾经每年造成全世界35万儿童残废。

sentences.english: The poliovirus causing the outbreak originated in northern India.
sentences.chinese: 引起此次疫情的脊髓灰质炎病毒源自印度北部。
非脊髓灰质炎肠病毒十分常见。

definition: polio/abbr. for 脊髓灰質炎|脊髓灰质炎[ji3 sui3 hui1 zhi4 yan2]
epidemic encephalitis B (abbr. for 乙型腦炎|乙型脑炎[yi3 xing2 nao3 yan2])
